title: Collateral Damage
description: Katie and the Union(s?) discuss dog nicknames, roundabouts (21:26), and the definition of “friendly banter.” An apology is issued for last week’s apology (31:40). The 49ers are alive (42:00), the Eagles are struggling to stay that way (56:38), and prank calls are still funny (1:06:15). Wearing gym shorts on a date (1:07:30). The Lakers need Vivien (1:19:00). T-Pain’s Instagram (1:32:10). Planet Fitness for gamers (1:37:30). And lastly: what do you watch when you don’t know what to watch (1:53:10)?
itunes:author: ESPN, Katie Nolan
itunes:subtitle: Katie and The Union discuss the draft, gym shorts, DM's & more
